appDesc.message: 2FAS Browser Extension is simple, private, and secure: 1 click, 1 tap, and your token is automatically entered!

errorExtNameMaxLengthMessage.message: Please enter the extension name with no more than 32 characters.

errorExtNameMinLengthMessage.message: Please enter the extension name with at least 3 characters.

errorInactiveTabMessage.message: Please refresh this tab to use the 2FAS Browser Extension.

errorOnInstallErrorMessage.message: Please restart your browser or reinstall the extension.

errorStorageCorruptedMessage.message: We will try to fix it for you. Please wait.

errorTimeoutMessage.message: Closed connection due to a time limit. Please click regenerate button to try again.

errorWebSocketMessage.message: Something went wrong with the WebSocket request. Please try again.

extNicknameDesc.message: Update the nickname for the 2FAS Browser Extension that will be visible on your mobile device. You can also change it later in the extension settings.

inActiveTabInfo.message: Please refresh this tab to use the 2FAS Browser Extension

infoBrowserActionWithoutTabMessage.message: Using outside the browser is not supported by 2FAS Extension

infoNativeNotificationsMessage.message: From now on, you'll be receiving system notifications instead of 2FAS custom ones. If you'd like to change this, go to the

infoTestMessage.message: Hi! This is just a test

infoUnsupportedProtocolMessage.message: Only HTTP and HTTPS protocols are supported by 2FAS Extension

installH1.message: To start, you need to pair this extension with the 2FAS mobile application.

installScan.message: Scan this code with your 2FAS mobile app

installStep3.message: Tap "Pair with web browser" and scan the QR code

installSuccessHeader.message: 2FAS Browser Extension is successfully paired with your 2FAS app

installSuccessSubheader.message: Now you can quickly autofill Two-Factor forms with mobile app confirmation.

modalDisconnectDeviceText.message: You are attempting to disconnect the device "DEVICE_NAME" from this browser extension. Are you sure?

modalSafariResetText.message: You are attempting to reset the 2FAS Browser Extension. Are you sure?

optionsContextMenuLabel.message: Show 2FAS Browser Extension option in context menu

optionsLogsDesc.message: Help us improve our browser extension by approving anonymous logs from your browser regarding 2FAS Browser Extension errors only.

optionsPinDesc.message: Check the Extension List to make it visible.

optionsPinOperaStep2Header.message: Find added Extension on the list and click “Details”.

optionsPinOperaStep2SubHeader.message: Then turn on “Allow on site with finding results”.

optionsPinSafariStep1.message: Right click on the address bar, select Toolbar customization

optionsPinSafariStep2.message: Find 2FAS icon on the list, drag it to the toolbar

optionsPushConfigDesc1.message: Native Browser's Notifications do not work?

optionsPushConfigDesc2.message: Make sure they are enabled in the system settings

optionsPushDesc.message: Choose a notification mechanism which will prompt you about communication with the 2FAS mobile app when you use this browser extension.

optionsSafariResetDesc.message: By resetting the extension you'll erase all your 2FAS Browser Extension settings and paired devices. Do so, if you're absolutely sure and aware of losing your settings and paired devices with the 2FAS Browser Extension! This action is not reversible!

optionsShortcutFirefoxDesc.message: To set or change this shortcut go to your browser settings, and extensions, then click on the gear icon and choose “Manage Extension Shortcuts.”

shortcutSetDesc.message: Set a shortcut to open the 2FAS Browser Extension on any page.

shortcutUseDesc.message: Use this shortcut to open the 2FAS Browser Extension on any page.

successPushSentMessage.message: Please check your phone and accept your login request.

warningSelectInputMessage.message: Select the text field for the 2FA token then click the extension icon or use the chosen shortcut.

warningTooSoonMessage.message: Please wait DIFF seconds before sending another request.
